Sentencas: The higher-order Ruddlesden- Popper phase La4Ni3O10-delta is prepared for the first time by electrostatic spray deposition ([SD) on a CGO (Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta) electrolyte and evaluated as an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell cathode.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: Different and innovative microstructures are obtained by varying the deposition time, nozzle to substrate distance, substrate temperature, solution flow rate, concentration and solvents.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: Single phase La4Ni3O10-delta films crystallize in an orthorhombic layered Ruddlesden-Popper = 3) structure after calcination at 950 degrees C for 8 h in air and is maintained after further sintering at 1100 degrees C for 6 h in air.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: The surface morphology, observed by SEM-FEG, is strongly influenced by the solution concentration, the nature of the solvents and the deposition temperature.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties are found to be strongly dependent on the microstructure of the cathode films.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: The lowest polarization resistance values obtained for the double layer (a 3-D coral-type film by [SD topped by a screen-printed layer) cathode are 2.01, 0.30 and 0.05 cm(2) at 600 degrees C, 700 degrees C and 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure

Sentencas: To the best of our knowledge, this La4Ni3O10-delta cathode shows the best performance reported to date for this composition.
Titulo: La4Ni3O10-δ as an efficient solid oxide fuel cell cathode: electrochemical properties versus microstructure
